message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, I'll take a bit more this time!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not too much!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking more!
I'm trying to be fair, but you're pushing me to take less!
You're getting close to the edge, I'm taking a big bite now!
I'm trying to hold on, but you're squeezing me tight!
You're running out of options, I'm taking the majority!
I'm trying to salvage what's left, but you're being ruthless!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking the lion's share!
I'm running out of options, but I'll give you a small chance to change your mind!
It's now or never, I'm taking almost everything!
